00039 class ValArrayVectorImpl : public VectorImpl
00040 {
00041 
00042 public:
00043   ValArrayVectorImpl(Int d = 1, Real v = Real(0));
00044   ValArrayVectorImpl(const VectorImpl& v);
00045   ValArrayVectorImpl(const ValArrayVectorImpl& v);
00046   explicit ValArrayVectorImpl(Real array[], Int d);
00047   ~ValArrayVectorImpl();
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("ValArrayVectorImpl"); }
00050   virtual Object& clone() const { return *new ValArrayVectorImpl(*this); }
00051     
00052   virtual void setZero() throw();
00053 
00054   // Only supported by some Implementations fix!!!
00055   virtual void resize(Int d) throw(std::runtime_error);
00056   virtual void swap(VectorImpl& v) throw(std::runtime_error);
00057 
00058   virtual void destructiveResize(Int d) throw(std::runtime_error);
00059 
00060   virtual Real& e(Int i) throw();
00061   virtual Real  e(Int i) const throw();
00062 
00063   virtual VectorImpl& operator=(const VectorImpl& src) throw();
00064   virtual ValArrayVectorImpl& operator=(const ValArrayVectorImpl& src) throw();
00065   virtual ValArrayVectorImpl& operator=(Real src) throw();
00066 
00067   virtual bool operator==(const VectorImpl& v) const throw();
00068   //virtual bool equals(const VectorImpl& v, Real epsilon = base::epsilon) const throw();
00069 
00070

00072

00075   virtual Real dot(const VectorImpl& v2) const throw();
00076   virtual VectorImpl& operator+=(const VectorImpl& v2) throw();
00077   virtual VectorImpl& operator-=(const VectorImpl& v2) throw();

00079   virtual VectorImpl& operator/=(Real s) throw();

00084 
00085 protected:
00086   typedef std::valarray<Real> ValArray;
00087   ValArray a;
00088 };
00089   
00090 
00091 // inlines
00092 inline ValArrayVectorImpl::ValArrayVectorImpl(Int d = 1, Real v)
00093   : VectorImpl(d), a(v,d)
00094 {}
00095 
00096 inline ValArrayVectorImpl::ValArrayVectorImpl(const VectorImpl& v)
00097   : VectorImpl(v), a(v.dim())
00098 {
00099   for(Int i=1; i<=v.dim(); i++) e(i) = v.e(i);
00100 }
00101 
00102 inline ValArrayVectorImpl::ValArrayVectorImpl(const ValArrayVectorImpl& v)
00103   : VectorImpl(v), a(v.a)  
00104 {}
00105 
00106 inline ValArrayVectorImpl::ValArrayVectorImpl(Real array[], Int d)
00107   : VectorImpl(d), a(array,d)
00108 {}
00109 
00110 inline ValArrayVectorImpl::~ValArrayVectorImpl() {}
00111 
00112 
00113 inline void ValArrayVectorImpl::setZero() throw()
00114 { a = 0; }
00115 
00116 inline void ValArrayVectorImpl::resize(Int d) throw(std::runtime_error)
00117 {
00118   ValArray tmp = a;
00119   std::slice s(0,minimum(d,this->d),1);
00120   destructiveResize(d);
00121   a[s] = tmp;
00122 }
00123 
00124 inline void ValArrayVectorImpl::swap(VectorImpl& v) throw(std::runtime_error)
00125 {
00126   throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not suppurted/implemented"));
00127 }
00128 
00129 inline void ValArrayVectorImpl::destructiveResize(Int d) throw(std::runtime_error)
00130 { a.resize(d); this->d = d; }
00131 
00132 inline Real& ValArrayVectorImpl::e(Int i) throw()
00133 { return a[i-1]; }
00134 
00135 inline Real ValArrayVectorImpl::e(Int i) const throw()
00136 { return a[i-1]; }
00137 
00138 inline ValArrayVectorImpl& ValArrayVectorImpl::operator=(Real src) throw()
00139 { a.resize(1); a[0] = src; d=1; return *this; }
00140 
00141 
00142 inline bool ValArrayVectorImpl::operator==(const VectorImpl& v) const throw()
00143 {
00144   if (instanceof(v,const ValArrayVectorImpl)) {
00145     const ValArrayVectorImpl& va = narrow_cast<const ValArrayVectorImpl>(v);
00146 
00147     std::valarray<bool> eq(dim()); eq = ( a == va.a ); // use copy constructor!!!
00148     for(Int i=0; i<dim(); i++)
00149       if (!eq[i]) return false;
00150     return true;
00151   }
00152   else 
00153     return VectorImpl::operator==(v);
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 inline VectorImpl& ValArrayVectorImpl::negate() throw()
00158 { a.operator-(); return *this; }
00159 
00160 
00161 inline VectorImpl& ValArrayVectorImpl::operator*=(Real s) throw()
00162 { a *= s; return *this; }
00163 
00164 inline VectorImpl& ValArrayVectorImpl::operator/=(Real s) throw()
00165 { a /= s; return *this; }
00166 
00167 
00168 inline Real* ValArrayVectorImpl::c_array() throw(std::runtime_error)
00169 { return &a[0]; }
00170 
00171 inline std::valarray<Real>& ValArrayVectorImpl::valarray() throw(std::runtime_error)
00172 { return a; }
00173
